scripts.test: npm run build && cucumber-js dist/features/*.feature --require dist/step-definitions/*.js -f json:./reports/report.json -t @Run
scripts.ci: cucumber-js dist/features/*.feature --require 'dist/step-definitions/*.js' -f json:./reports/report.json -t @Ci || TEST_EXIT_CODE=$? || npm run generate-html-report || REPORT_EXIT_CODE=$? || echo "test_exit_code=$TEST_EXIT_CODE report_exit_code=$REPORT_EXIT_CODE" || exit $TEST_EXIT_CODE
scripts.test-report: npm run test && npm run generate-html-report
